In my home state of Minnesota, deer hunting is a $1 billion industry & a longstanding tradition in many communities. I appreciate hearing from experts in science & management to learn how Congress can best support efforts to engage the public on CWD.

We know the number of CWD-infected animals is growing & disrupting the balance needed to sustain healthy ecosystems. It will take the collaboration of federal agencies & other partners to combat the spread of CWD.

Yesterday’s court ruling means that on a federal level, we need to double down on efforts to restore #NetNeutrality through the #SaveTheNet Act. But the ruling also said states can enforce their own protections. One year from today, all Minnesotans will need a REAL ID for air travel – and because there’s a backlog, the process can currently take up to 50 days.
